ext_descriptions.ext_description: An absorbed_dose_measure is the value of an absorbed dose of radiation.
An acceleration_measure is the value of the rate of change of velocity.
An amount_of_substance_measure is the value for the quantity of a substance when compared with the number of atoms in 0.012 kilogram of carbon 12.
An area_measure is the value of the extent of a surface.
A capacitance_measure is the value of capacitance.
A celsius_temperature_measure is the value for the degree of heat of a body.
A conductance_measure is the value of an electrical conductance.
A context_dependent_measure is the value of a physical quantity that may be interpreted based on the context in which it is used.
A count_measure is the value of a count.
A descriptive_measure is a textual value of a physical quantity.
A dose_equivalent_measure is the value of the radiation dose equivalent.
An electric_charge_measure is the value of an electrical charge.
An electric_current_measure is the value for the movement of electrically charged particles.
An electric_potential_measure is the value of an electrical potential.
An energy_measure is the value of energy, or work done, in a system.
A force_measure is the value of a force.
A frequency_measure is the value of a frequency.
An illuminance_measure is the value of illuminance.
An inductance_measure is the value of inductance.
A length_measure is the value of a distance.
A luminous_flux_measure is the value of luminous flux.
A luminous_intensity_measure is the value for the brightness of a body.
A magnetic_flux_density_measure is the value of magnetic flux density.
A magnetic_flux_measure is the value of magnetic flux.
A mass_measure is the value of the amount of matter that a body contains.
A measure_value is a value as defined in ISO 31-0.

A non_negative_length_measure type is a
whose value is greater than or equal to zero.
A non_negative_length_measure shall be positive or zero.

A numeric_measure is the numeric value of a physical quantity.
In order to define measure quantities that are not included as specific types in this standard a numeric_measure may be used as the
of a , the corresponding
being an
or a .
A parameter_value is the value that specifies the amount of a parameter in a parameter space.
A plane_angle_measure is the value of an angle in a plane.

A positive_length_measure is a
that is greater than zero.
The value shall be positive.

A positive_plane_angle_measure is a
that is greater than zero.
The value shall be positive.

A positive_ratio_measure is a
that is greater than zero.
The value shall be positive.
A power_measure is the value of power, or the rate of doing work.
A pressure_measure is the value of force per unit area.
A radioactivity_measure is the value of the radioactive disintegration.
A ratio_measure is the value of the relation between two physical quantities that are of the same kind.
A resistance_measure is the value of electrical resistance.
An si_prefix is the name of a prefix that may be associated with an . The definitions of SI prefixes are specified in ISO 1000.
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000.

An si_unit_name is the name of an SI unit.
The definitions of the names of SI units are specified in ISO 1000.
see ISO 1000;

ext_description.note: ISO 1000 gives "kilogram" as the SI unit name. This part of ISO 10303 uses "gram" as the SI unit name.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000;
see ISO 1000.
A solid_angle_measure is the value of a solid angle.
A thermodynamic_temperature_measure is the value for the degree of heat of a body.
A time_measure is the value of the duration of a period.

A unit is a physical quantity, with a value of one.
A unit is used to express other physical quantities of the same kind.
A velocity_measure is the value of the rate of change of position.
A volume_measure is the value of the solid content of a body.

An absorbed_dose_measure_with_unit is a type of
in which the physical quantity is an absorbed dose of radiation as defined in ISO 31.

The
be of type .

An absorbed_dose_unit is a type of
in which the absorbed dose is expressed.
The dimensional exponents shall be equal to those of the Gray as defined in ISO 31.

An acceleration_measure_with_unit is a type of
in which the physical quantity is an acceleration.

The
be of type .

An acceleration_unit is a type of
in which the acceleration of an object is expressed.
The dimensional exponent of length shall be equal to one, the dimensional exponent of time shall be equal to minus two, and all the other dimensional exponents shall be equal to zero.

An amount_of_substance_measure_with_unit is a type of .
This entity data type shall only be used to characterize a number of particles.
The unit shall be an .

An amount_of_substance_unit is a type of
in which the number of elementary entities of a substance as compared to the number of atoms in 0.012 kilograms of carbon-12 is expressed.
This definition applies to the SI quantity 'mole'. When the mole is used, the elementary entities, whose quantity is expressed, must be specified. They may be atoms, molecules, ions, electrons or other particles or specified groups of such particles (see ISO 31-8).
This unit corresponds to one of the seven fundamental quantities as specified in ISO 1000.
The dimensional exponent of amount of substance shall be equal to one and all the other dimensional exponents shall be equal to zero.

An area_measure_with_unit is a type of
in which the physical quantity is an area as defined in ISO 31.
The unit shall be an .

An area_unit is a type of
used to measure the extent of a surface.
The dimensional exponent of length shall be equal to two and all the other dimensional exponents shall be equal to zero.

A capacitance_measure_with_unit is a type of
in which the physical quantity is an electric capacitance as defined in ISO 31.

The
be of type .

A capacitance_unit is a type of
in which the capacitance is expressed.
The dimensional exponents shall be equal to those of the farad as defined in ISO 31.

A celsius_temperature_measure_with_unit is a type of
in which the physical quantity is a Celsius temperature as defined in ISO 31-4.
The unit shall be a .

A conductance_measure_with_unit is a type of
in which the physical quantity is a conductance as defined in ISO 31.

The
shall be of type .

A conductance_unit is a type of
in which the electrical conductance is expressed.
The dimensional exponents shall be equal to those of the siemens as defined in ISO 31.

A context_dependent_unit is a type of
that is not related to the system of units defined in this part of ISO 10303.
The number of parts in an assembly is a physical quantity that may be measured in a unit called “parts”. Such a unit cannot be related to an SI unit.

the
by which the context_dependent_unit is known.

A conversion_based_unit is a type of
that defines a unit on the basis of a .
The
attribute of the
defines the conversion factor.
An inch is a conversion_based_unit. It is from the Imperial system, its name is "inch", and it can be related to the , millimetre, through a
whose value is 25.4 millimetre. A foot is also a conversion_based_unit. It is from the Imperial system, its name is "foot", and it can be related to an , millimetre, either directly or through the unit called "inch".

the
by which the conversion_based_unit is known.

the
that specifies the physical quantity from which the conversion_based_unit is derived.
The dimensional exponents shall be equal to those from the .

A derived_unit is an expression of units.
Newtons per square millimetre is a derived_unit.
A derived_unit may be either an
or an , or a , or an , or a , or a , or an , or a , or an , or an , or a
or a , or a , or an , or an , or a , or a , or a , or a , or a , or a .
the s and their exponents that define the derived_unit.

ext_description.p: the label by which the derived_unit is known.
ext_description.note: This attribute is an upwardly compatible addition to derived_unit as specified in ISO 10303-41:1994.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: There shall be either more than one member in the elements set or the value of the exponent of the single element of the elements set shall not be equal to one.

ext_description.p:
Each derived_unit shall be the
in at most one .
ext_description.note:
The
data type is defined in basic_attribute_schema of this part of ISO 10303.
A template for constraining the population of the entity data types defined in the basic_attribute_schema is described in annex E.

ext_descriptions.ext_description:
A derived_unit_element is the association of a
with an exponent.
This entity is used in this part of ISO 10303 to represent an element of the dimensional expression of a .
Newtons per square millimetre is a derived unit. It has two elements, Newton whose exponent has a value of 1, and millimetre whose exponent is -2.

the
that specifies the mathematical factor of the element.
the power that is applied to the unit attribute.

A dimensional_exponents is a definition of the powers of the dimensions of the seven base quantities.
The seven base quantities are defined in ISO 31.
This entity enables the dimensional expression of any physical quantity with respect to these seven base quantities.
Length, mass, time, electric current, thermodynamic temperature, amount of substance, and luminous intensity are the seven base quantities.
A length of 2 millimetres has a length exponent of 1. The remaining exponents are equal to 0.
A velocity of 2 millimetres per second has a length exponent of 1 and a time exponent of -1. The remaining exponents are 0.
the power of the length base quantity.
the power of the mass base quantity.
the power of the time base quantity.
the power of the electric current base quantity.
the power of the thermodynamic temperature base quantity.
the power of the amount of substance base quantity.
the power of the luminous intensity base quantity.

A dose_equivalent_measure_with_unit is a type of
in which the physical quantity is a radiation dose equivalent as defined in ISO 31.

The
shall be of type .

A dose_equivalent_unit is a type of
in which the radiation dose equivalent is expressed.
The dimensional exponents shall be equal to those of the sievert as defined in ISO 31.

An electric_charge_measure_with_unit is a type of
in which the physical quantity is an electric charge as defined in ISO 31.

The
shall be of type .

An electric_charge_unit is a type of
in which the electric charge is expressed.
The dimensional exponents shall be equal to those of the coulomb as defined in ISO 31.

An electric_current_measure_with_unit is a type of
in which the physical quantity is an electric current as defined in ISO 31.
The unit shall be an .

An electric_current_unit is a type of
in which the movement of electrically charged particles is expressed.
This unit corresponds to one of the seven fundamental quantities as specified in ISO 1000.
The dimensional exponent of electric current shall be equal to one and all the other dimensional exponents shall be equal to zero.

An electric_potential_measure_with_unit is a type of
in which the physical quantity is an electric potential as defined in ISO 31.

The
shall be of type .

An electric_potential_unit is a type of
in which the electric potential is expressed.
The dimensional exponents shall be equal to those of the volt as defined in ISO 31.

An energy_measure_with_unit is a type of
in which the physical quantity is energy as defined in ISO 31.

The
shall be of type .

An energy_unit is a type of
in which the energy is expressed.
The dimensional exponents shall be equal to those of the joule as defined in ISO 31.

A force_measure_with_unit is a type of
in which the physical quantity is force as defined in ISO 31.

The
shall be of type .

A force_unit is a type of
in which the force is expressed.
The dimensional exponents shall be equal to those of the newton as defined in ISO 31.

A frequency_measure_with_unit is a type of
in which the quantity measured is a frequency as defined in ISO 31.

The
shall be of type .

A frequency_unit is a type of
in which the frequency is expressed.
The dimensional exponents shall be equal to those of the hertz as defined in ISO 31.

A global_unit_assigned_context is a type of
in which the units apply to all s of the applicable kind.
For an example of the use of this entity, see annex F.4.6.
the units that apply in the .

ext_description.p: Each unit shall be a different kind of unit.
ext_description.note: For an example of the use of this entity, see annex F.4.6.

ext_descriptions.ext_description:
An illuminance_measure_with_unit is a type of
in which the quantity measured is an illuminance as defined in ISO 31.

The
shall be of type .

An illuminance_unit is a type of
in which the illuminance is expressed.
The dimensional exponents shall be equal to those of the lux as defined in ISO 31.

An inductance_measure_with_unit is a type of
in which the quantity measured is an inductance as defined in ISO 31.

The
shall be of type .

An inductance_unit is a type of
in which the inductance is expressed.
The dimensional exponents shall be equal to those of the henry as defined in ISO 31.

A length_measure_with_unit is a type of
in which the physical quantity is a length as defined in ISO 31.
The unit shall be a .

A length_unit is a type of
in which distances are expressed.
This unit corresponds to one of the seven fundamental quantities as specified in ISO 1000.
The dimensional exponent of length shall be equal to one and all the other dimensional exponents shall be equal to zero.

A luminous_flux_measure_with_unit is a type of
in which the quantity measured is a luminous flux as defined in ISO 31.

The
shall be of type .

A luminous_flux_unit is a type of
in which the luminous flux is expressed.
The dimensional exponents shall be equal to those of the lumen as defined in ISO 31.

A luminous_intensity_measure_with_unit is a type of
in which the physical quantity is a luminous intensity as defined in ISO 31.
The unit shall be a .

A luminous_intensity_unit is a type of
in which the brightness of a body is expressed.
This unit corresponds to one of the seven fundamental quantities as specified in ISO 1000.
The dimensional exponent of luminous intensity shall be equal to one and all the other dimensional exponents shall be equal to zero.

A magnetic_flux_density_measure_with_unit is a type of
in which the physical quantity is magnetic flux density as defined in ISO 31.

The
shall be of type .

A magnetic_flux_density_unit is a type of
in which the magnetic flux density is expressed.
The dimensional exponents shall be equal to those of the tesla as defined in ISO 31.

A magnetic_flux_measure_with_unit is a type of
in which the quantity measured is a magnetic flux as defined in ISO 31.

The
shall be of type .

A magnetic_flux_unit is a type of
in which the magnetic flux is expressed.
The dimensional exponents shall be equal to those of the weber as defined in ISO 31.

A mass_measure_with_unit is a type of
in which the physical quantity is a mass as defined in ISO 31.
The unit shall be a .

A mass_unit is a type of
in which the amount of matter that a body contains is expressed.
This unit corresponds to one of the seven fundamental quantities as specified in ISO 1000.
The dimensional exponent of mass shall be equal to one and all the other dimensional exponents shall be equal to zero.

A measure_with_unit is the specification of a physical quantity as defined in ISO 31. A measure_with_unit may be either a
or a , or a , or an , or a , or a , or an , or a , or a , or a , or an , or a , or a , or an , or a , or an , or a , or an , or an , or a , or a , or a , or an , or an , or a , or a , or a , or a , or a , or a , or an , or a , or a .
the value of the physical quantity if expressed with respect to the unit_component.
the unit in which the physical quantity is expressed.
The unit_component shall be a valid unit for the kind of measure specified by the value_component.

A named_unit is a unit quantity. A named_unit may be either a
or a , or a , and additionally may be a
or a , or a , or an , or a , or an , or a , or a , or a , or a , or a .
the exponents of the base properties by which the named_unit is defined.

A plane_angle_measure_with_unit is a type of
in which the physical quantity is a plane angle as defined in ISO 31.
The unit shall be a .

A plane_angle_unit is a type of
in which angles in planes are expressed.
All the dimensional exponents shall be equal to zero.
A positive_length_measure_with_unit is a type of of which the value is positive.
The value of the unit shall be positive.
A positive_plane_angle_measure_with_unit is a type of of which the value is positive.
The value of the unit shall be positive.

A power_measure_with_unit is a type of
in which the quantity measured is a power as defined in ISO 31.

The
shall be of type .

A power_unit is a type of
in which the power is expressed.
The dimensional exponents shall be equal to those of the watt as defined in ISO 31.

A pressure_measure_with_unit is a type of
in which the quantity measured is a pressure as defined in ISO 31.

The
shall be of type .

A pressure_unit is a type of
in which the pressure is expressed.
The dimensional exponents shall be equal to those of the pascal as defined in ISO 31.

A radioactivity_measure_with_unit is a type of
in which the physical quantity is radioactivity as defined in ISO 31.

The
shall be of type .

A radioactivity_unit is a type of
in which the radioactivity is expressed.
The dimensional exponents shall be equal to those of the becquerel as defined in ISO 31.

A ratio_measure_with_unit is a type of
in which the physical quantity is a ratio as defined in ISO 31.
The unit shall be a .

A ratio_unit is a type of
in which the ratio between two physical quantities of the same kind is expressed.
All the dimensional exponents shall be equal to zero.

A resistance_measure_with_unit is a type of
in which the quantity measured is an electrical resistance as defined in ISO 31.

The
shall be of type .

A resistance_unit is a type of
in which the electrical resistance is expressed.
The dimensional exponents shall be equal to those of the ohm as defined in ISO 31.

A si_absorbed_dose_unit is a type of
and a type of
in which the absorbed dose is expressed in SI units.

The
of the
shall be gray.
No other name shall be assigned to this entity.

A si_capacitance_unit is a type of
and a type of
in which the electric capacitance is expressed in SI units.

The
of the
shall be farad.
No other name shall be assigned to this entity.

A si_conductance_unit is a type of
and a type of
in which the electrical conductance is expressed in SI units.

The
of the
shall be siemens.
No other name shall be assigned to this entity.

A si_dose_equivalent_unit is a type of
and a type of
in which the radiation dose equivalent is expressed in SI units.

The
of the
shall be sievert.
No other name shall be assigned to this entity.

A si_electric_charge_unit is a type of
and a type of
in which the electric charge is expressed in SI units.

The
of the
shall be volt.
No other name shall be assigned to this entity.

A si_electric_potential_unit is a type of
and a type of
in which the electric potential is expressed in SI units.

The
of the
shall be volt.
No other name shall be assigned to this entity.

A si_energy_unit is a type of
and a type of
in which the energy is expressed in SI units.

The
of the
shall be joule.
No other name shall be assigned to this entity.

A si_force_unit is a type of
and a type of
in which the force is expressed in SI units.

The
of the
shall be newton.
No other name shall be assigned to this entity.

A si_frequency_unit is a type of
and a type of
in which the frequency is expressed in SI units.

The
of the
shall be hertz.
No other name shall be assigned to this entity.

A si_illuminance_unit is a type of
and a type of
in which the illuminance is expressed in SI units.

The
of the
shall be lux.
No other name shall be assigned to this entity.

A si_inductance_unit is a type of
and a type of
in which the inductance is expressed in SI units.

The
of the
shall be henry.
No other name shall be assigned to this entity.

A si_magnetic_flux_density_unit is a type of
and a type of
in which the magnetic flux density is expressed in SI units.

The
of the
shall be tesla.
No other name shall be assigned to this entity.

A si_magnetic_flux_unit is a type of
and a type of
in which the magnetic flux is expressed in SI units.

The
of the
shall be weber.
No other name shall be assigned to this entity.

A si_power_unit is a type of
and a type of
in which the power is expressed in SI units.

The
of the
shall be watt.
No other name shall be assigned to this entity.

A si_pressure_unit is a type of
and a type of
in which the pressure is expressed in SI units.

The
of the
shall be pascal.
No other name shall be assigned to this entity.

A si_radioactivity_unit is a type of
and a type of
in which the radioactivity is expressed in SI units.

The
of the
shall be becquerel.
No other name shall be assigned to this entity.

A si_resistance_unit is a type of
and a type of
in which the resistance is expressed in SI units.

The
of the
shall be ohm.
No other name shall be assigned to this entity.

An si_unit is a type of
that defines a unit with respect to the system of units defined in ISO 80000.

the
that specifies the ratio with the unit specified by name. The value of this attribute need not be specified.

the
by which the si_unit is known.

the
for the si_unit.

If the si_unit is a
it shall not be used by a
unless the prefix is .

A solid_angle_measure_with_unit is a type of
in which the physical quantity is a solid angle as defined in ISO 31.
The unit shall be a .

A solid_angle_unit is a type of
in which solid angles are expressed.
All the dimensional exponents shall be equal to zero.

A thermodynamic_temperature_measure_with_unit is a type of
in which the physical quantity is a thermodynamic temperature as defined in ISO 31.
The unit shall be a .

A thermodynamic_temperature_unit is a type of
in which the degree of heat of a body is expressed.
This unit corresponds to one of the seven fundamental quantities as specified in ISO 1000.
The dimensional exponent of thermodynamic temperature shall be equal to one and the other dimensional exponents shall be equal to zero.

A time_measure_with_unit is a type of
in which the physical quantity is a time as defined in ISO 31.
The unit shall be a .

A time_unit is a type of
in which the duration of periods is expressed.
This unit corresponds to one of the seven fundamental quantities as specified in ISO 1000.
The dimensional exponent of time shall be equal to one and all the other dimensional exponents shall be equal to zero.

A velocity_measure_with_unit is a type of
in which the quantity measured is a velocity.

The
shall be of type .

A velocity_unit is a type of
in which the velocity is expressed.
The dimensional exponent of length shall be equal to one, the dimensional exponent of time shall be equal to minus one, and all the other dimensional exponents shall be equal to zero.

A volume_measure_with_unit is a type of
in which the physical quantity is a volume as defined in ISO 31.
The unit shall be a .

A volume_unit is a type of
used to measure the extent of a solid.
The dimensional exponent of length shall be equal to three and all the other dimensional exponents shall be equal to zero.

The derive_dimensional_exponents function determines the dimensional exponents of a unit. For named units the dimensions attribute is returned and for derived units the dimensional exponents are calculated from its elements.

(input) the
that the
are being derived from.

The dimensions_for_si_unit function returns the
of the given .

(input) the name of the
for which the
will be returned.

The valid_units function validates a . If the unit of the
is valid the function returns TRUE. Otherwise, it returns FALSE.

(input) the candidate
that is to be checked.
